review.title: “Smart man does his homework”
review.pros: Pros – Sen. Corker knows how to delegate and make informed decisions. Therefore, he relies on his staff to put together well rounded arguments and often plays devil's advocate to try to get to the best solution. The staff are nice and friendly and open.Sen. Corker makes people feel appreciated, seen and heard. He is honest and expects his office to run as such.
review.cons: Cons – Often times it does get "political" when working in an office. There is a sense of heirarchy to some LAs and LCs.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep up the good work.
